snippet: Eric Schmidt, Google’s executive chairman, arrived in North Korea on Monday with what was billed as a humanitarian mission.
abstract: Former New Mexico Gov Bill Richardson leads private delegation that includes Google's executive chairman Eric Schmidt to North Korea, controversial trip to country that is among the most hostile to the Internet; says he will try to meet with Kenneth Bae, 44-year-old South Korean-born American citizen who was arrested in North Korea for crimes against the country.
lead_paragraph: Eric Schmidt, Google’s executive chairman, arrived in North Korea on Monday with what was billed as a humanitarian mission.

headline.seo: American Delegation Arrives in North Korea on Controversial Private Trip
headline.main: American Group Begins Private Trip to North Korea
headline.print_headline: American Group Begins Private Trip to North Korea
